~IAkSinkPluginContext
virtual bool AK::IAkSinkPluginContext::IsPrimary (  )  [pure virtual]

Query if the sink plugin is instantiated on the main output device (primary tree).

Returns:
True if the sink plugin is instantiated on the main output device (primary tree), false otherwise.
